alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 1:52PM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Perkins County, the Northern Meade County Plains, Ziebach County, Haakon County, Northern Jackson County and Southern Perkins County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach
